attributes.additional_details: Acoustic Coordinated Reset Neuromodulation is a treatment which has been shown to help reduce or eliminate tinnitus in about 70% of cases, according to the British Tinnitus Association. At present this treatment is only available privately, at the London Tinnitus Clinic, at a cost of £4,500. Tinnitus can be a serious debilitating condition, and it is my belief, and the purpose of this petition, that this treatment should be made available to all sufferers on the NHS.
